sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: vtkTDxInteractorStyleCamera allows the end-user to manipulate tha camera with a 3DConnexion device.
To create an instance of class vtkTDxInteractorStyleCamera, simply invoke its constructor as follows obj = vtkTDxInteractorStyleCamera
